title: [Oracle SQL] Enhancing CreateFunction of Oracle by adding several kinds of statement
body: Related issue: https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/27569 In this pr, I added several kinds of statement for createFunctionStatement of Oracle. I referred to this doc where you can find the detailed definition: https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/21/lnpls/block.html#GUID-9ACEB9ED-567E-4E1A-A16A-B8B35214FC9D Now the following SQL can be parsed: "CREATE FUNCTION f(cur SYS_REFCURSOR, mgr_hiredate DATE) RETURN NUMBER IS emp_hiredate DATE; before number :=0; after number:=0; begin loop fetch cur into emp_hiredate; exit when cur%NOTFOUND; if emp_hiredate > mgr_hiredate then after:=after+1; else before:=before+1; end if; end loop; close cur; if before > after then return 1; else return 0; end if; end; "

title: Add documentation about the `infra-expr-espresso` module
body:
Fixes #22899.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Add documentation about the `infra-expr-espresso` module.
  - This PR is detached from #28609. Related to https://github.com/oracle/graal/issues/7500 .
  - Update the URL of the GraalVM documentation. Ref. https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/34929 . 
  - Rename `InlineExpressionParserFactory#removeTypeNameInExpr` to `InlineExpressionParserFactory#getExprWithoutTypeName`.
